name: The Lalit Temple View Khajuraho

reviews.text: We prebooked a winter package for this hotel. I must say it was well worth what we paid for our 1 night stay here. Our winter package entitlted us to two nights but because our flight was cancelled to Khajuraho we took a motor vehicle and unfortunately it took us 14hours to get there from Varanasi.
reviews.title: Beautiful Hotel, Great Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Originally it was very hard to find - it took us 1 hour to locate. And being 4am in the morning there was no-one to ask for directions apart from front desk and even the guy on the front desk wasnt very good with directions (we were later told he was new at the hotel). We finally found it when you drive straight down past the temples and past a circuit board which is opposite to this hotel.
reviews.title: Immaculate luxury, shame about the tv.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When we arrived we were put into the wrong room as part of our package deal we were suppose to be upgraded. But this room (pool facing room) was far nicer then the upgraded room as it had a beautiful view of the small mandir and the pool and the kamasutra temples in the distance.
reviews.title: In love in Khajuraho

likes.disliked: — the fixed glass window, I would have liked to hear birds singing ?

reviews.text: As a result of their mistake we were offered free dinner (we didnt realise it was free until we went to pay and they said no charge) and drinks for us (and our friends who were staying at the Usha Bendela and were over to have dinner with us that night). They even gave us a reduced rate on the motor vehicle we hired from the hotel.
reviews.title: Luxurious And Peaceful Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We only had breakfast (included in our package) and dinner at the hotel and I must say there is alot of food. The prices were reasonable when browsing at the menu, and there was a big selection from vegetarian to fish to chicken & lamb - and food was of the highest standard.
reviews.title: Best hotel in Khajuraho, overlooking west temple group

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We did not have a good experience at this hotel. In fact, it rivals the Taj Residency in Aurangabad for the worst hotel of our 2-week trip to India. The entire hotel was virtually deserted. We were the only people in the dining room each time we appeared for a meal. Food was very mediocre and they even charged us for bottled water at breakfast. No other hotel did that! The room was a typical motel-style accommodation. The pool was large and attractive but that did not make up for the hotel's deficits. This may be the best that Khajuraho offers but it is certainly not up to the standard we were expecting from the reviews. Our travel agent was not familiar with this hotel but we will certainly not recommend that they send other clients here.
reviews.title: More of a motel than a hotel

reviews.text: From pickup at the airport to our stay just 2 walking minutes from the main western group of temples in Khajuraho till departure everything was simply perfect.
reviews.title: Great experience

reviews.text: - Service and statt attitude was outstanding
reviews.title: Where peace and tranquility exists

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - Rooms were well set and decorated, clean and spacious
reviews.title: Such a peaceful place after Agra's chaos

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Excellent Service and Wonderful Peaceful Hotel

aka: The Lalit Temple View Khajuraho Hotel
description: Khajuraho "The City of Exotic-Temples", a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Built between 950 AD & 1050AD, these exquisitely sculpted magnificent temples, are grouped into three divisions - the western, eastern & southern. Located 200 meters from the famous Western Group of Temples offering excellent views, The Grand Temple View Khajuraho is architecturally built along contemporary lines embellished with inspirations from this rich and exotic locale. After total renovation, the hotel has been recommissioned as high quality boutique living experience.
